job.title: Business Development Manager
job.description:
This position is accountable for growth in the North American Strategic Partner Channel by identifying, qualifying, securing and signing high growth Strategic Partners.<br>

Key Responsibilities
<ul><li>Identify, source, engage and proactively consult with potential strategic partners, resulting in a partnership agreement thus providing a profitable portfolio and ensuring achievement of channel financial goals and targets which compliment organization goals and targets.</li><br><li>Develop business plan for each strategic partner including a sales/marketing strategy.</li><br><li>Coordinate and conduct presentations to Senior Level Executives within strategic partners and Moneris.</li></ul>

Primary Requirements
Requirements: <br><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree required, master’s degree preferred or equivalent business experience</li><br><li>5-7 years strategic business development experience required, with a demonstrated ability to over-achieve against defined targets</li> <br><li>Ability to apply strategic thinking to business issues and drive results</li> <br><li>Strong business acumen with analytical ability to assess the business and drive the organization forward</li> </ul>
